old: "日記の１ページが落ちている"
new: "A page out of a diary has fallen down."

old:
侵食の進んだ、危険な土地ではありましたが――
退治した大型魔物に侵食の気配は無く
今まで同様強敵だったものの、少し安心しました
new:
Although the land was highly corrupted and dangerous -
there was no sign of infestation in the large demons that we eliminated.
And although they were as powerful as ever, we were a bit relieved.

old:
しかし、このような土地で侵食されず生息するとは
移り住んだばかりなのか、抗体があるのか――
new:
However, to live in a land like this without being infected...
Is it because they just moved in, or do they have antibodies?

old:
ベンジャミン様はその美しい魔物からも素材を
回収すると、装備品をまた一つ作成されました
この装備もまた――塔に納めるおつもりなのでしょう
new:
Master Benjamin collected materials from that beautiful demon and created another piece of equipment.
This equipment also intended to be stored in the tower.

old:
先日立ち寄った拠点で耳に入って来たのですが――
フィンダムには、偉大な人物が亡くなった際
装具や装飾品を副葬品として埋葬する文化が
あるそうなのです
new: I overheard at a stopover the other day-- that there is a tradition in Phindym where when great men die, they are buried with ornaments and ornaments as burial accessories.

old:
ベンジャミン様がご友人の足跡を巡りながら
作成した装備品を埋葬していくのは――
フィンダムの流儀に則った弔い、なのかもしれません
new: Perhaps Master Benjamin, while tracing the footsteps of his friend, is burying the equipment he created—an homage following the Phindym tradition.
